scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/*.tsx src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx src/**/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.tsx src/**/**/**/*.ts src/**/**/**/*/tsx && sass-lint -c .sass-lint.yml -v -q
scripts.test: npm run lint && tsc && cp -r src/stylesheets lib && mocha --require lib/testHelper.js lib/__tests__/*.js lib/**/__tests__/*.js lib/**/**/__tests__/*.js
scripts.build-dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* dist && cp -r src/stylesheets lib && NODE_ENV=development UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=128 webpack --watch --progress --display-modules --config webpack.config
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* dist && cp -r src/stylesheets lib && NODE_ENV=production UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=128 webpack -p --progress --display-modules --config webpack.config
scripts.prod: tsc && npm run build-prod && npm run start
scripts.dev: tsc && npm run build-dev | npm run start
